creator: saripella.ramaraju@gmail.com
text:
Iam trying to connect to tomcat 5.0.28 from apache 2.2 using mod_jk2.so.
i have done the configuration properly according to the steps mentioned in the
site. iam getting the following error while starting the apache 2.2 from 
service monitor. 

The Apache service named  reported the following error:
>>> httpd.exe: Syntax error on line 115 of E:/Program Files/Apache Software 
Foundation/Apache2.2/conf/httpd.conf: Cannot load E:/Program Files/Apache 
Software Foundation/Apache2.2/modules/mod_jk2.so into server: The specified 
procedure could not be found.
Bugzilla is not a support forum, try the tomcat user list,
creator: fhanik@apache.org
